All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Admin
Represents an administrator user in the library system.
AdminDAO
Data Access Object for Admin entity.
AdminMenu
Provides a console-based admin interface for managing the library system.
AdminService
Service class responsible for admin-related operations such as registration, login, user management, and sending overdue reminders.
AdminServiceTest
 
Book
Represents a book in the library system.
BookDAO
Data Access Object for Book entity.
BookSearcher
Context class for searching books using different search strategies.
BookSearcherTest
 
BookService
Service class responsible for book-related operations such as adding books, retrieving all books, and searching books by title, author, or ISBN.
BookServiceTest
 
Borrower
Represents a borrower (library patron) in the system.
BorrowerService
Service class that manages borrower-related operations such as loading borrowed media data, generating overdue reports, paying fines, and displaying borrowed items.
BorrowingService
Service class responsible for managing the borrowing and returning of media items such as books and CDs.
BorrowingServiceTest
 
BorrowRecordDAO
Data Access Object for BorrowRecord entity.
CD
Represents a CD in the library system.
CDDAO
Data Access Object for CD entity.
CDService
Service class responsible for managing CD-related operations such as adding, searching, and retrieving CDs from the database.
CDServiceTest
 
DatabaseConnection
Utility class for establishing a connection to the SQLite database.
EmailNotifier
Sends email notifications to users via an EmailServer.
EmailNotifierTest
 
EmailServer
Represents an email server that can send emails and track sent messages.
EmailServer.Email
Inner class representing a sent email.
EmailServerTest
 
FineDAO
Data Access Object for Fine entity.
Media
Abstract base class representing media items in the library.
MediaDAO
Data Access Object for Media entity.
MediaRecord
Represents a borrowing record for a media item.
MediaTest
 
PasswordUtil
Utility class for password hashing and salt generation with enhanced error handling.
SearchByAuthor
Concrete search strategy for searching books by author name.
SearchByAuthorTest
 
SearchByISBN
Concrete search strategy for searching books by ISBN pattern.
SearchByISBNTest
 
SearchByTitle
Concrete search strategy for searching books by title.
SearchByTitleTest
 
SearchStrategy
Interface for book search strategies.
User
Represents a user in the library system.
UserDAO
Data Access Object for User entity.
UserMenu
Provides a console-based user interface for interacting with the library system.
UserService
Service class that handles user registration and login operations.
UserServiceTest
 
UserWithOverdueBooks
Represents a user with overdue books.
UserWithOverdueBooksTest
